plot: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.
title: El tributo del mar
plot_es: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.
plot_en: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.
